title: Textile, "The Seven Gods of Felicity on the Treasure Ship"
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson
description: Gift cloth or fukusa. Embroidered design shows the Shichi Fukujin or the seven gods of good fortune on a boat. The design includes a crane and turtle, both symbols longevity and felicity. A phoenix also appears as part of the design.

participants.person_name: Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "The Seven Gods of Felicity on the Treasure Ship".Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson. 1941-31-3.
